record.title: ORDERS FOR WEDNESDAY, DECEMBER 10, 2008
record.narrative:
ORDERS FOR WEDNESDAY, DECEMBER 10, 2008 -- (Senate - December 09, 2008)

[Page: S10838]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that when the Senate completes its business today, it stand adjourned until 10:30 a.m., on Wednesday, December 10; that following the prayer and pledge, the Journal of proceedings be approved to date, the morning hour be deemed expired, the time for the two leaders be reserved for their use later in the day, and that there then be a period for the transaction of morning business for up to 1 hour, with Senators permitted to speak for up to 10 minutes each, and that the Senate then resume consideration of the motion to proceed to S. 3297.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
